name: PARTYENGINE
description:
PARTYENGINE is an application that procedurally generates a variety of parties as a sort of music visualizer. Put PARTYENGINE on a screen at a party you're hosting and be amazed as the energy of the room increases tenfold. We will likely be updating PARTYENGINE in the coming weeks with more content and interactive elements so stay tuned!

Controls:
[SPACEBAR] - generate new party
[ARROW KEYS UP/DOWN] change BPM
[M] - mute,  so you can play your own beats instead
[ESC] - exit

PARTYENGINE was developed in <48 hours as part of GLOBALGAMEJAM'19. The theme was "What does home mean to you" and to us, home is where you party. 

Developed by Nick Kaman and Caelan Pollock.
Music by Felix Peaslee
